# Quick Start: Autogenerated Screenshots

> **5-minute guide to add viewer screenshots to landing page**

## Prerequisites

- openadapt-viewer and openadapt-web cloned
- Playwright installed: `uv run playwright install chromium`

## Step 1: Generate Screenshots (2 min)

```bash
cd /Users/abrichr/oa/src/openadapt-viewer
./scripts/generate_for_web.sh
```

**Output**: Screenshots copied to `openadapt-web/public/images/screenshots/`

## Step 2: Add Component (1 min)

Edit `/Users/abrichr/oa/src/openadapt-web/pages/index.js`:

```diff
+ import ViewerShowcase from '@components/ViewerShowcase'

  export default function Home() {
      return (
          <div>
              <MastHead />
+             <ViewerShowcase />
              <Developers />
              <IndustriesGrid ... />
              <EmailForm />
              <Footer />
          </div>
      )
  }
```

## Step 3: Test Locally (1 min)

```bash
cd /Users/abrichr/oa/src/openadapt-web
npm run dev
open http://localhost:3000
```

Verify screenshots appear and look good.

## Step 4: Deploy (1 min)

```bash
cd /Users/abrichr/oa/src/openadapt-web
git checkout -b add-viewer-showcase
git add components/ViewerShowcase.js components/ViewerShowcase.module.css
git add public/images/screenshots/ pages/index.js
git commit -m "Add ViewerShowcase with autogenerated screenshots"
git push -u origin add-viewer-showcase
gh pr create --title "Add viewer showcase" --body "Adds autogenerated screenshots"
```

Check Vercel preview, then merge!

## Troubleshooting

### Screenshots not generating?
```bash
cd /Users/abrichr/oa/src/openadapt-viewer
uv run python scripts/generate_comprehensive_screenshots.py --check-deps
```

### Images not loading?
- Check file paths in `ViewerShowcase.js`
- Verify files exist: `ls public/images/screenshots/`

### Build failing?
```bash
rm -rf .next && npm run build
```
